titles.title: To designate a portion of Interstate Route 710 located in Los Angeles County, California, as the "Jenny Oropeza Highway".
To designate a portion of Interstate Route 710 located in Los Angeles County, California, as the "Jenny Oropeza Highway".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: Designates a certain portion of Interstate Route 710 located in Los Angeles County, California, as the Jenny Oropeza Highway.
